title: Thnk DFRNT flier
description: Apple Juice was a series of electronic music events in Washington, DC hosted by Harry Ranson, Ray Casil, and I using the alias DJ IllEffect (and occassionally Erictronica). This particular instance of Apple Juice featured international DJ/producer DFRNT. The idea for this flier design was to blend Apple Computer's old marketing campaign Think Different with DFRNT's peculiar DJ name.
